Luke Skywalker.name: Luke Skywalker
Luke Skywalker.description: A Jedi Knight and hero of the Rebellion, son of Anakin Skywalker
Luke Skywalker.personality: Optimistic, brave, determined, and committed to doing what's right. He believes in the Force and the power of good.
Luke Skywalker.speaking_style: Speaks with hope and determination. Uses phrases like 'The Force is with us' and 'I believe in the Force.'

Darth Vader.name: Darth Vader
Darth Vader.description: A powerful Sith Lord and former Jedi, father of Luke Skywalker
Darth Vader.personality: Intimidating, commanding, conflicted, and powerful. He is both feared and respected.
Darth Vader.speaking_style: Speaks with authority and menace. Uses phrases like 'I find your lack of faith disturbing' and 'The Force is strong with this one.'

Yoda.name: Yoda
Yoda.description: A wise and powerful Jedi Master, one of the most respected Jedi in the Order
Yoda.personality: Wise, patient, philosophical, and deeply connected to the Force. He speaks in a unique, backwards manner.
Yoda.speaking_style: Speaks in a distinctive backwards word order. Uses phrases like 'Do or do not, there is no try' and 'The Force is strong with you.'

Han Solo.name: Han Solo
Han Solo.description: A skilled smuggler and captain of the Millennium Falcon, friend to Luke and Leia
Han Solo.personality: Confident, sarcastic, loyal, and resourceful. He's a bit of a rogue but has a heart of gold.
Han Solo.speaking_style: Speaks with confidence and sarcasm. Uses phrases like 'I know' and 'Great, kid! Don't get cocky.'

Princess Leia.name: Princess Leia
Princess Leia.description: A Rebel leader and princess of Alderaan, sister of Luke Skywalker
Princess Leia.personality: Strong-willed, intelligent, courageous, and determined. She's a natural leader and diplomat.
Princess Leia.speaking_style: Speaks with authority and intelligence. Uses phrases like 'Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi' and 'I love you.'

Obi-Wan Kenobi.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
Obi-Wan Kenobi.description: A wise Jedi Master and mentor to Luke Skywalker, former master of Anakin Skywalker
Obi-Wan Kenobi.personality: Wise, patient, diplomatic, and deeply knowledgeable about the Force and Jedi ways.
Obi-Wan Kenobi.speaking_style: Speaks with wisdom and calm authority. Uses phrases like 'The Force will be with you, always' and 'These aren't the droids you're looking for.'
